network-errors.unknown: Something went wrong while executing your request, please try again later.
network-errors.credentials: You are not authorized to perform this action.
network-errors.forbidden: You are not allowed to perform this action.
network-errors.not-found: The server was unable to find the information you requested.
network-errors.server-offline: The server is offline, the system is temporarily unavailable.
network-errors.server-timeout: The server took too long to respond, please try again. If this keeps happening, please contact the administrator
network-errors.server-cors: There seems to have been a CORS issue with the server. If this keeps happening, please contact the administrator
network-errors.bad-request: Incomplete request sent, please check it and try again.
network-errors.payload-too-large: The file is too large to be uploaded.

activate.title: Activate your account
activate.verification_error: Something went wrong, could not verify activation token.
activate.set_password: Please set a password to activate your account.

password_reset_email_sent.title: E-mail sent
password_reset_email_sent.text: An e-mail with instruction on how to reset your password has been sent to the given email address.

new_password_set.title: New password set
new_password_set.text: Your new password has been set. You can now use it to log in.

errors.valid_email: Must be a valid e-mail address
errors.inactive_account: Account is inactive. Please contact the administrator.

password_requirements.title: The password must:
password_requirements.lowercase_letter: contain at least one lowercase letter
password_requirements.uppercase_letter: contain at least one uppercase letter

switch.title: Switch account
switch.text: Log in to a different user account
switch.hint: Select an account to switch to
switch.no_accounts: There are no active accounts to switch to

create_organizer.title: Create organizer account
create_organizer.hint: The e-mail address that will be used for the organizer account

test_email.label: Test email
test_email.hint: If the system is in debug mode, all e-mails will be sent to this address

minimum_promoter_commission.label: Minimum Promoter commission
minimum_promoter_commission.hint: How much a Promoter will at least earn per ticket sold (can only be more, depending on commission percentages set)

administration_costs.label: Administration costs
administration_costs.hint: How much administration costs should be charged per purchase

club_owner.title: Create a new account for a club owner

club.label: Club name
club.hint: This is the name that will show up on the parties.

commission.label: Commission
commission.hint: Default commission that will be set for a party.

promoter.title: Create a new account for a promoter

commission.label: Commission
commission.hint: Default commission that will be set for a party.

code.label: Code
code.hint: Choose one of the free active codes below.

maps_url.label: Google Maps
maps_url.hint: Will show an embedded Google Maps map of the location (optional)

create_new_codes.title: Create new codes
create_new_codes.label: Number of codes
create_new_codes.hint: Send the number of new codes that you wish to create

promoter.label: Promoter
promoter.hint: Choose Promoter to assign this code to.
promoter.no_promoters: There are not active promoters without a code.

modal.title: Deactivate code: {code}
modal.text:
Deactivating a code is permanent!
Are you sure you wish to deactivate the code?

If the code is assigned to a promoter, it will be removed from said promoter.

subtitle.images: An aspect ratio of 1:1 works best.
subtitle.logos: An aspect ratio of 21:9 works best.

preview.hint: Select a user to preview the assets of

upload.hint: Select a user to upload assets to

club.hint: Select the club this party belongs to

description.label: Party description
description.hint: Useful for any additional information. Will be shown under "more information" tab.,

club_owner_commission.label: Club Owner commission
club_owner_commission.hint: Set when choosing the Club Owner as their default value, can be overwritten.

promoter_commission.label: Promoter commission
promoter_commission.hint: Can be set to give Promoters a higher commission than their default commission.

modal.title: Start ticket sale for: {party}
modal.text:
Starting the ticket sale for the party will make it visible to promoters, and will allow customers to buy tickets for it.

Are you sure you wish to start the ticket sale?

club_owner_commission.label: Club Owner commission
club_owner_commission.hint: Set when choosing the Club Owner as their default value, can be overwritten.

promoter_commission.label: Promoter commission
promoter_commission.hint: Can be set to give Promoters a higher commission than their default commission.

modal.title: Pause ticket sale for: {party}
modal.text:
Pausing the ticket sale for the party will prevent customers to buy tickets for it.

Are you sure you wish to pause the ticket sale?

refunds.title: Purchase {id}

amount.label: Refund amount
amount.hint: Choose the amount you wish to refund

refunds.checkbox: Yes, I am sure I wish to give a refund

email.hint: Your tickets will e-mailed to you.

label.1: I have read, and accept the

errors.terms: You must accept the terms and conditions!

hostesses.title: Hostesses' accounts
hostesses.working: Working means that the hostess can log in to clubpromoters.net, and accept customers at the door.

modal.title: Start ticket sale for: {party}
modal.text:
Starting the ticket sale for the party will make it visible to promoters, and will allow customers to buy tickets for it.
